ComicInfo.Summary:
Special anniversary issue - Dan Mendoza returns for the one year anniversary of the ongoing series in a special issue written and drawn by the Zombie Tramp creator himself. As Janey makes her way to Florida for vengeance, she's offered a chance at forgiveness to one of those that wronged her and set her on her twisted path.
Features regular and risqué variant covers by series creator Dan Mendoza (risqué limited to 2500 copies) and a variant cover by series artist TMChu (limited to 2000 copies), and for the first time a blank "sketch" cover (limited to 1500 copies).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | Var | Risque Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | Var | Limited Edition Blank Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | None | 3 | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | TMChu | 4 | RE | San Diego Comic Con Exclusive Cover | Dan Mendoza | 5 | RE | 1-Up Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Unlisted | Missing | RE | AOD Collectables Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Unlisted | Missing | RE | Back Room Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Unlisted | Missing | RE | In Your Dreams Collectables Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Unlisted | Missing | Note: The main cover and its topless variant are an extreme closeup homage of The Last Supper.
